attributes.action: Allow England to become an independent country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England is the greatest country in the world, this country has achieved more than any other in our world history, we as English natives deserve to make 100% of our own laws & run our own country.
Independent England is the way forward.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
